verses.verse: And when the queen<WH4436> of Sheba<WH7614> heard<WH8085> of the fame<WH8088> of Solomon<WH8010> concerning the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068>, she came<WH935> to prove<WH5254> him with hard questions<WH2420>.

But I believed<WH539> not the words<WH1697>, until I came<WH935>, and my eyes<WH5869> had seen<WH7200> it<WH2677>: and, behold, the half was not told<WH5046> me<WH2451>: your wisdom and prosperity<WH2896> exceeds<WH3254> the fame<WH8052> which I heard<WH8085>.

Now the weight<WH4948> of gold<WH2091> that came<WH935> to Solomon<WH8010> in one<WH259> year<WH8141> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> sixty<WH8346> and six<WH8337> talents<WH3603> of gold<WH2091>,
